DOC.brief_summary: This study determine breakfast ( egg breakfast bagel breakfast ) beneficial effect appetite .
DOC.detailed_description: Test Day 1 ( 4 hour ) - This fasting visit ( nothing besides water 12 hour prior visit ) - Your child offer one two breakfast ( egg breakfast bagel breakfast ) . He/she ask eat food provide . - He/she ask rate taste meal . - He/she offer pasta lunch . Test Day 2 ( 4 hour ) - This scheduled 1 week Test Day 1 - This fasting visit ( nothing besides water 12 hour prior visit ) - The procedure visit Test Day 1 . Your child offer breakfast he/she receive last visit . The sequence 2 breakfast randomly assign child .
DOC.criteria: • Is healthy boy girl 14 17 year age Is healthy boy girl 4 6 year age • Is suffer disease major heart condition , type 1 diabetes , cancer , eat disorder , serious illness require intensive longterm medical treatment Has allergies/sensitivities/dislikes egg , soy , wheat Uses drug recreationally Is actively attempt lose weight
